Values.ShortDescription_Value: If you want baptism by air, here’s your ride. Not only does this bike clear big jumps with ease, its tough, chromoly frame feels nearly weightless when you’re off the ground! Add on 100mm of front suspension to cushion the drops and 3-piece cranks for that sweet barspin.
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Heavy-duty chromoly frame provides extra strength for jumps at the park
  • RST Space Jump offers 100mm of plush suspension for those hard hits
  • Heat treated, tubular chromoly 3-piece cranks guarantee a stiff and durable ride
  • Conical washers let you covert this single speed ride to an 8/9 speed bike
  • Hayes MX4 mechanical disc brakes deliver low maintenance, all-weather stopping power
  • Kenda K-Rad and Kenda Kiniption tires are designed for aggressive street jumping
  • Sun Ditch Witch rims with Mongoose rear disc hubs are built to withstand those tough landings on the pavement

• Just place the mounting holder over your handlebar, insert the basket and Walla - you’ve got a place to stash all your extra items!
  • Basket easily lifts off the holder
  • Features a handle for carrying convenience
  • Built tough with a rust resistant finish for years of durable use
  • Easy, tool-free installation
  • Compatible with most handlebars
  • Not compatible with racing-style handlebars

Values.ShortDescription_Value: Blackburn’s strongest rack is built for extended tours, off-road rides and long distance commutes. And it even holds a child seat for safe transport of your little one!
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Welded, oversized aluminum construction with a reinforced frame and powder coated finish delivers bombproof performance
  • 3/8” center strut stabilizes your load and maximizes strength
  • Accommodates panniers or a child seat
  • 40lb. capacity
  • Braze-on design
  • Fits most bikes
  • Mounting hardware included

Values.ShortDescription_Value: From the local car show at the corner donut shop to the big time car meet in Carlisle, PA; the Classic and Kustom car culture is pure Americana. Drawing its influence from this popular lifestyle that fascinates enthusiasts worldwide, the Nirve Classic rolls into town with a vintage look and subtle appeal that’ll take you right back to the good ole’ days.
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Durable, steel frame is strong, resilient and ensures a smooth ride through town
  • Wide, upright handlebars with shorty fenders and painted graphics give this ride a retro look
  • Roll pleat embossed seat with dual springs keeps your backside comfortable
  • Rear coaster brake delivers rapid braking power no matter what the forecast

Values.ShortDescription_Value: Nothing exemplifies the cruiser lifestyle better than a sunset ride along the waterfront with a balmy breeze blowing through your hair. The Nirve Lahaina features surf inspired graphics that are as much at home along the beaches as they are anywhere in the world. No matter where you live, you can claim your piece of paradise with this beautiful, casual cruiser.
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Durable, steel frame is strong, resilient and ensures a smooth ride
  • Wide, upright handlebars with full fenders and painted island graphics give this ride a retro look
  • Island flower embossed saddle with dual springs keeps your backside comfortable
  • Rear coaster brake delivers rapid braking power in any weather

Values.ShortDescription_Value: The pinnacle of Schwinn’s indoor cycling line, the Evolution IC Sleeveless Jersey is built to withstand countless hours of cardio-intense exercise on your favorite resistance unit!
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Polyester fabric with inherent stretch wicks away moisture and comfortably moves with you when the cadence is high
  • 16” zipper puts generous ventilation at your fingertips
  • Schwinn Quality logo adds competitive style
  • Rear zippered pocket holds all your indoor training essentials
  • Elastic hem with silicone for a comfortable fit

Values.Form_Value: Skinny fit – cut closely to the body

Values.ShortDescription_Value: Smooth and nearly effortless, 9-speed shifting action that’s light, rigid and stiff.
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Special tooth profiles, pick-up spikes and ramps help make your shifts quiet, easy and trouble-free
  • Up-shifts are amazingly fast, crisp and won’t compromise pedaling efficiency
  • Lightweight aluminum construction provides better power transfer, acceleration and speed

Values.ShortDescription_Value: Break-away from the pack in these stylish sunglasses built for comfort, performance and easy viewing.
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Durable Grilamid TR-90 frame provides full coverage and tough protection for any condition
  • ShiftTech Photochromatic lenses automatically respond to light conditions by adjusting the tint level to match your surroundings
  • TPE shrouds on stem tips and nose pads ensure a no-slip grip
  • Microfiber pouch keeps your glasses clean and protected
  • 100% UVA/UVB protection
  • Black, Silver and White frames each come with two interchangeable lenses in Orange and Grey

Values.ShortDescription_Value: See and be seen with highly visible front (white) and rear (red) LED lights!
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Each light houses five super-bright LEDs to provide you with added safety on the road
  • Front: steady and flashing modes with 30 hour runtime/90 hour flashing, thumbscrew mount for quick installation and removal, uses three AAA batteries
  • Rear: four light modes (flash, chase, random and steady), up to 80 hour runtime, quick release seatpost mount, uses two AAA batteries

Values.ShortDescription_Value: Remember those comfy “moon boots” that Mom made you wear in the wintertime? They made you feel like you were walking on marshmallows! That’s why we couldn’t resist the Moon shoe from Northwave. Not only do these shoes have the technical features you need to go hard, they feel so luxuriously comfortable, you’ll never want to take them off!
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• NRG thermoplastic sole delivers lightweight stiffness while remaining flexible enough for stellar pedal performance
  • Airflow System with polyurethane improves ventilation and increases stability
  • Air Sport footbed offers the perfect amount of support and cushioning
  • Lift Stop heel places your foot in its most natural position for efficient power transfer
  • Two Velcro straps provide a secure fit

Values.ShortDescription_Value: Designed for lightning fast transitions and bike splits.
Values.LongDescription_Value:
• Single reverse pull strap (so it doesn't get hung up in the chain when running through the transition area) and dual finger loops allow you to be on your way faster than ever
  • Ventilated upper paired with a super-stiff ventilated sole provides plenty of airflow to keep your feet cool and dry
  • Soft, comfortable neoprene liner

Values.ShortDescription_Value: Designed for lightning fast transitions and bike splits.

  • Ventilated upper paired with a super-stiff ventilated sole provides plenty of airflow to keep your feet cool and dry
  • Soft, comfortable neoprene liner
